EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: VIP Cocktail Reception with VMTurbo at VMworld
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Register for the VMTurbo VMworld VIP Cocktail Reception Monday, August 25, 2014 | 6 p.m. Twenty Five Lusk Restaurant & Lounge San Francisco, CA
Register Here: http://bit.ly/1lJp0HS 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
